    Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
    java.lang.Long[] searchSolution​(int timeLimit, Graph g)
    Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0
    void setRecalculate​(boolean recalculate)
    set the algorithm whether it is in the partial recalculation for adding a request or a complete calculation of the existing requests

    • searchSolution

      public java.lang.Long[] searchSolution​(int timeLimit, Graph g)
      Description copied from interface: TSP
      Search for a shortest cost hamiltonian circuit in g within timeLimit milliseconds (returns the best found tour whenever the time limit is reached) Warning: The computed tour always start from vertex 0
      Specified by:
      searchSolution in interface TSP
      Parameters:
      timeLimit - the time limit of the first calculation, in milliseconds
      g - the Graph to be passed for calculation

    • bound

      protected abstract int bound​(long currentVertex, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> unvisited, Graph g)
      Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - the current vertex
      unvisited - the collection of unvisited address vertexes
      Returns:
      a lower bound of the cost of paths in g starting from currentVertex, visiting every vertex in unvisited exactly once, and returning back to vertex 0.

    • iterator

      protected abstract java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Long> iterator​(java.lang.Long currentVertex, java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> unvisited, Graph g)
      Method that must be defined in TemplateTSP subclasses
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - the current vertex
      unvisited - the collection of unvisited address vertexes
      g - the Graph
      Returns:
      an iterator for visiting all vertices in unvisited which are successors of currentVertex
